text:
Hi all,
I have cloned some modules to use in my drag and drop templates, but when I go into the page editor, I then can't find them, anyone experienced this?
Yes - make sure that your modules are in the same theme, and that the toggle to make them available in the editor is enabled. (Top right corner when youâ€™re editing the module in the Design Manager)
I have done both of those
If you cloned them there is a chance that there label is also the same which would make them not show up in the editor. I would make sure that the label is unique.
I've changed the name, where would I find the label to change that?
Assuming youre using design tools it is located on the left bar above the fields section. If you are developing locally it is in meta.json
